org.cyclops.integratedcrafting.api.recipe

Interface IRecipeIndex

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IRecipeIndexModifiable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RecipeIndexDefault

    public interface IRecipeIndex
    Indexes recipes by output.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      <T,M> java.util.Iterator<org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.capability.recipehandler.IRecipeDefinition> getRecipes(org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.IngredientComponent<T,M> outputType, T output, M matchCondition)

    • Method Detail

      • getRecipes

        java.util.Set<org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.capability.recipehandler.IRecipeDefinition> getRecipes()
        Returns:
        All recipes that are available.

      • getRecipes

        <T,M> java.util.Iterator<org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.capability.recipehandler.IRecipeDefinition> getRecipes(org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.IngredientComponent<T,M> outputType,
                                                                                                                   T output,
                                                                                                                   M matchCondition)
        Find recipes with the given output.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The instance type.
        M - The matching condition parameter, may be Void.
        Parameters:
        outputType - The recipe component type.
        output - An output ingredient instance.
        matchCondition - A condition under which the matching should be done.
        Returns:
        An iterator of the recipes that have the given output.
